Name: ASTRID
About the game: Astrid is a side scroller game with melee combat and magical elements set in the mythical world of Niflheim. Astrid. The lone survivor of an army of warriors and mercenaries sent North to defeat a powerful sorcerer and rid the world of a plague of monsters. Battle through beautiful realistic landscapes destroying enemies in your wake. Manage your stamina and magic powers along the way.
